data.text: @SylviaLazos @megconk79 @EvanTeaches11 @ClarkCountySch @CarrieKaufman @JackieValley @maddiewhitetv @shmiller9315 @fortiz505 @RMarkNewburn @TimHughesNV @k_dockweiler $85 a pop, or do we get the group rate discount?   Then how many of the kids go to college?

@megconk79 @EvanTeaches11 @RomanceGun @ClarkCountySch @CarrieKaufman @JackieValley @maddiewhitetv @shmiller9315 Direct that question to @fortiz505 @RMarkNewburn @TimHughesNV @k_dockweiler bc that’s a NVStateBd decision

@ParkeJefferson @EvanTeaches11 @SylviaLazos @RomanceGun @ClarkCountySch @CarrieKaufman @JackieValley @maddiewhitetv @shmiller9315 I’m a staunch advocate for public schools. It’s a key societal element. I’ve begged wealthy Las Vegans to send kids to CCSD & not Gorman, Christian or charters. We need their voices. But I can’t justify it any longer. I’ve considered alt options for my own child at this point.

@megconk79 @EvanTeaches11 @SylviaLazos @RomanceGun @ClarkCountySch @CarrieKaufman @JackieValley @maddiewhitetv @shmiller9315 Bad enough that my little's teacher wants to quit, she debated not even returning after Christmas break. I understand why tho. We're evaluating our options for the Fall.

@megconk79 @EvanTeaches11 @SylviaLazos @RomanceGun @ClarkCountySch @JackieValley @maddiewhitetv @shmiller9315 In a story about an Indiana house rep who was fired as a sr. vp of College Board, I learned that he made ALMOST $500,000 as sr. vp. This is a great indication how much College Board earns in revenue. (SAT and AP, not ACT, but same issue)

@RomanceGun @megconk79 @ParkeJefferson @SylviaLazos @ClarkCountySch @CarrieKaufman @JackieValley @maddiewhitetv @shmiller9315 We don’t have the training either. I’d completely reimagine what a school is & give the teachers more time to address social/emotional learning in their classrooms.

@RomanceGun @EvanTeaches11 @ParkeJefferson @SylviaLazos @ClarkCountySch @CarrieKaufman @JackieValley @maddiewhitetv @shmiller9315 I agree, that can’t be on teachers. I have private healthcare and sought support there. But that doesn’t dissolve the culpability of the district in  responding to trauma stemming from incidents at school. We need skilled intervention that understands the playing field.

@EvanTeaches11 @megconk79 @ParkeJefferson @SylviaLazos @ClarkCountySch @CarrieKaufman @JackieValley @maddiewhitetv @shmiller9315 True, instead of paying companies to sell us technology that seeks to be constantly replaced after a year, remember iPad carts smh? I'm down to hire outside counselors to help kids.  We, teachers, don't have time to help kids and their mental health.

@megconk79 @ParkeJefferson @SylviaLazos @RomanceGun @ClarkCountySch @CarrieKaufman @JackieValley @maddiewhitetv @shmiller9315 Every school should have multiple qualified humans that can address what students are feeling.

Especially since school is the primary cause of most of those feelings.
